    AbilityIndication

    Script that controls object used to indicate who was affected by the Unit Ability.

    Script containing all sounds used in the game.

    Battle Journal logic and controls.

    Script that controls the Dialogue Window UI element.

    DontDestroy

    Script for objects that should not be destroyed when the scene is switched.

    DoorScript

    Script attached to a door object. Called when the door should be opened.

    DropdownAttribute

    [Dropdown(path, displayProperty)]

    • path: the path of the List
    • displayProperty: the property you want to display in the dropdown selection

    Class containing all events in the game.

    GameManager

    Main game Script containing data that contains fields and method used accessed from multiple other scripts.

    Script that controls the GameMessageMenu UI element. Used when the game starts and after the game is finished.

    GridSystem

    Script that manages Protagonist Hero Object controls and logic.
